title: Response model name masking - rewrite upstream model in response body
description: When proxy routes to GLM-5 but user requested e.g. claude-sonnet-4-5, rewrite the model field in both streaming SSE chunks and non-streaming JSON responses to match the user's original requested model. This prevents SDK/API users from seeing the actual upstream model name.
